description_en: Mean and median gross monthly household income by parliamentary constituency from 2019 to 2024.
description_ms: Purata dan penengah pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah mengikut kawasan parlimen dari 2019 hingga 2024.
methodology_en:
Data on individual salaries and wages [in the formal economy](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/formal-sector-wages) is easy to obtain from administrative records. However, data on household income is more difficult to tabulate, as it requires the correct definition of a statistical household, as well as the inclusion of non-salary sources of income such as property income, dividends, and interest. For this reason, it requires the use of a representative survey or census.

 In Malaysia, data on household income (as well as expenditure and access to basic amenities) is collected through the Household Income and Expenditure Survey (HIES), which is conducted at least twice within any 5-year period. The data shown here was tabulated from household-level HIES records spanning 1970 to 2022 (the latest edition). For a full description of the methodology, please refer to the [technical notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
methodology_ms:
Data mengenai gaji dan upah individu [dalam ekonomi formal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/formal-sector-wages) mudah diperoleh daripada rekod pentadbiran. Sebaliknya, data mengenai pendapatan isi rumah lebih sukar untuk dihasilkan, kerana ia memerlukan definisi statistik yang tepat bagi isi rumah, serta sumber pendapatan bukan gaji seperti pendapatan hartanah, dividen, dan faedah. Oleh itu, ia memerlukan penggunaan survei atau banci.

Di Malaysia, data mengenai pendapatan isi rumah (serta perbelanjaan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas) dikumpul melalui Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES), yang dilaksanakan sekurang-kurangnya dua kali dalam mana-mana tempoh 5 tahun. Data yang dipaparkan di sini telah dihasilkan daripada rekod HIES peringkat isi rumah dari tahun 1970 hingga 2022 (edisi terkini). Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, sila rujuk kepada [nota teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/hies-technotes).
caveat_en: This data presents nominal values, i.e. they have not been adjusted for inflation. Furthermore, Parliment-level data is only published from 2019 (relative to [state-level data](https://open.dosm.gov.my/data-catalogue/hh_income_state) which is available from 1970) as prior HIES samples were not sufficient to support Parliament-level granularity.
caveat_ms: Data ini menunjukkan nilai nominal, iaitu mereka tidak diselaraskan untuk inflasi. Selain itu, data di peringkat Parlimen hanya diterbitkan mulai 2019 (berbanding dengan [data negeri](https://open.dosm.gov.my/data-catalogue/hh_income_state) yang tersedia dari 1970) kerana sampel HIES sebelumnya tidak mencukupi untuk membolehkan pecahan mengikut kawasan Parlimen.

fields.name: state
fields.description_en: [Categorical] One of 16 states, including the 3 Federal Territories
fields.description_ms: [Kategoril] Satu daripada 16 negeri, termasuk 3 Wilayah Persekutuan

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 as the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: income_mean
fields.description_en: [Integer, RM] Average gross monthly household income
fields.description_ms: [Integer, RM] Purata pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah

fields.name: income_median
fields.description_en: [Integer, RM] Median gross monthly household income; this is generally less than the mean income due to the right-skewed distribution of income
fields.description_ms: [Integer, RM] Penengah pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah; ini biasanya kurang daripada pendapatan purata kerana taburan pendapatan yang condong ke kanan
